dc_title_s: A Marine Geophysical Atlas of the Circum-Antarctic to 30* S Version 1 (1991) Region: Antarctica
dc_description_s: Part of the series: Marine Geophysical Atlas Antarctic; Scale =1 : 11,674,000. All maps are copyright of their respective owners. By downloading and using the map, you are subject to the map's copyright terms and agree to the PGC's Acknowledgement Policy: https://www.pgc.umn.edu/guides/user-services/acknowledgement-policy/. This map was obtained from the Byrd Polar Research Center at The Ohio State University and the digital version is hosted by the Polar Geospatial Center at the University of Minnesota.
